title: Gokukoku no Brynhildr: Kara Sawagi
original_name: 極黒のブリュンヒルデ 第 11.5 話 から騒ぎ
opening_song: "BRYNHILDR IN THE DARKNESS -Ver. EJECTED-" by Nao Tokisawa (鴇沢 直)

sinopse: Unaired episode 11.5 included with the second Blu-ray/DVD volume.
